article.title: ;; Keybindings
article.para: ;; Export Docbooks and PDFs ;; Use with (org-export-as-docbook-pdf[-and-open]) (setq path-to-docbook "/usr/local/Cellar/docbook/5.0/docbook/xsl/1.76.1/fo/docbook.xsl") (setq org-export-docbook-xslt-proc-command (concat "xsltproc --output %s " path-to-docbook " %s")) (setq org-export-docbook-xsl-fo-proc-command "fop %s %s")
